text:
Real Matters | 2 Devs (Intermediate to Senior, Full-Stack or strong Frontend) , 1 QA, 1 Security Manager, 1 Systems Admin | Toronto | Full Time, Onsite

Real Matters is a leading technology company that provides services for the mortgage lending and insurance industries. We help our clients make incredibly smart decisions about real estate by leveraging technology to deliver better quality, transparency and efficiency.

We are based in Markham, and offer partial remote, especially for the right candidates.

Our stack is React/Redux, Node, GraphQL, Couchbase, Go, Java.

Interested? You can email me at the address in my profile.
